name: KIT digital Czech
overview:
Established in 1991 KIT digital Czech, formerly known as Visual Connection, has specialized in the supply and delivery of comprehensive digital media solutions, services and components. Within the framework of six divisions we design, deliver and integrate systems for professional production, processing, distribution and archiving of audiovisual materials. We have been involved in a number of installations which include television and radio stations, graphics, audiovisual production and postproduction, state administration, and healthcare. We specialize in designing comprehensive solutions providing a range of services, e.g. consultancy, streaming, webcasting and encoding. We provide service work, training and leasing of equipment. We also offer financial services.

We work calmly and efficiently, offering our clients an above-standard service. Along with our clients we look for the most effective technical and organizational solutions to meet their needs. We give priority to long-term and continuous service and support, with an emphasis on maximum technical and organizational quality.Our outstanding level of expertise is supported by an ever-growing number of successfully implemented projects. Visual Connection received the Standout System Integration Award, given for the best integrator of Omneon servers during 2004-2005.

During 2006, KIT digital Czech has implemented the Quality management system in accordance with ISO 9001:2008 standard, the certification process was successfully finished in July. The system was then improved to form the Integrated management systems (IMS).
